On Mon, Oct 27, 2003 at 01:04:04PM -0000, bhaugen32 wrote:
> Anybody (Mark?) know anything more about this now?

I think he's primarily talking about the KnowNow extensions, though
I'm not exactly sure what KnowNow has done with full ACID or what an
"end-to-end Decision function" is.  I talked with Rohit about
ACID/KnowNow back in 2000 or so and at that time I think he and Adam had
"CID" worked out, with some thoughts about using underlying database
infrastructure to provide the "A".  It seems they've know got a way of
doing "A" in a decentralized manner.  I'm skeptical, but Rohit's
surprised me before.

Mark.
